I am wondering what would be the best approach to test an asynch 
response.  For instance I have a simple object Messenger that allows 
messages to be added.  Users may subscribe (MessengerLister) to the 
messenger to be updated of responses.

I have already implemented this with JUnit by making the 
TestMessenger TestCase a MessengerLister.  After I add a message I 
sleep until a response is supplied. I then wake up (or time out for 
failure) and test if this is the correct response to assert if the 
test failed or passed. 

I am wondering if this is at all a "normal" approach, or if anyone 
has a better idea.  

Thanks!
